name: tvOS 13.4
available: Apple TV 4K and Apple TV HD

advisories.available: Apple TV 4K and Apple TV HD
advisories.impact: A sandboxed process may be able to circumvent sandbox restrictions
advisories.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved restrictions.

advisories.available: Apple TV 4K and Apple TV HD
advisories.impact: An application may be able to use an SSH client provided by private frameworks
advisories.description: This issue was addressed with a new entitlement.

advisories.available: Apple TV 4K and Apple TV HD
advisories.impact: An application may be able to use arbitrary entitlements
advisories.description: This issue was addressed with improved checks.

advisories.available: Apple TV 4K and Apple TV HD
advisories.impact: An application may be able to execute arbitrary code with system privileges
advisories.description: A use after free issue was addressed with improved memory management.

advisories.available: Apple TV 4K and Apple TV HD
advisories.impact: A malicious application may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: A memory initialization issue was addressed with improved memory handling.

advisories.available: Apple TV 4K and Apple TV HD
advisories.impact: An application may be able to read restricted memory
advisories.description: A memory initialization issue was addressed with improved memory handling.

advisories.available: Apple TV 4K and Apple TV HD
advisories.impact: A malicious application may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: Multiple memory corruption issues were addressed with improved state management.

advisories.available: Apple TV 4K and Apple TV HD
advisories.impact: Multiple issues in libxml2
advisories.description: A buffer overflow was addressed with improved bounds checking.

advisories.available: Apple TV 4K and Apple TV HD
advisories.impact: Multiple issues in libxml2
advisories.description: A buffer overflow was addressed with improved size validation.

advisories.available: Apple TV 4K and Apple TV HD
advisories.impact: A local user may be able to view sensitive user information
advisories.description: An access issue was addressed with additional sandbox restrictions.

advisories.available: Apple TV 4K and Apple TV HD
advisories.impact: Some websites may not have appeared in Safari Preferences
advisories.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved restrictions.

advisories.available: Apple TV 4K and Apple TV HD
advisories.impact: Processing maliciously crafted web content may lead to arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: A memory corruption issue was addressed with improved memory handling.

cves.credit: Dongzhuo Zhao working with ADLab of Venustech

advisories.available: Apple TV 4K and Apple TV HD
advisories.impact: An application may be able to read restricted memory
advisories.description: A race condition was addressed with additional validation.

cves.credit: Sergei Glazunov of Google Project Zero

advisories.available: Apple TV 4K and Apple TV HD
advisories.impact: A remote attacker may be able to cause arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: A memory consumption issue was addressed with improved memory handling.

advisories.available: Apple TV 4K and Apple TV HD
advisories.impact: Processing maliciously crafted web content may lead to a cross site scripting attack
advisories.description: An input validation issue was addressed with improved input validation.

advisories.available: Apple TV 4K and Apple TV HD
advisories.impact: Processing maliciously crafted web content may lead to arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: A type confusion issue was addressed with improved memory handling.

advisories.available: Apple TV 4K and Apple TV HD
advisories.impact: A download's origin may be incorrectly associated
advisories.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved restrictions.

advisories.available: Apple TV 4K and Apple TV HD
advisories.impact: Processing maliciously crafted web content may lead to code execution
advisories.description: A use after free issue was addressed with improved memory management.

advisories.available: Apple TV 4K and Apple TV HD
advisories.impact: A remote attacker may be able to cause arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: A type confusion issue was addressed with improved memory handling.

cves.credit: Brendan Draper (@6r3nd4n) working with Trend Micro’s Zero Day Initiative

advisories.available: Apple TV 4K and Apple TV HD
advisories.impact: A file URL may be incorrectly processed
advisories.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved restrictions.
